comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on June 27, 2022, 07:13:12 AMAnd the funds raised for the war are not printed, they are taxed from the people.Printing is taxation. A country can raise funds for guns in the same way they can raise funds for anything. Either by increasing the taxation of income, consuming, property, or by just printing more money which essentially does all three. It is well understandable, though, that not all countries have this option, and those that do suffer economically afterwards.Alternative for taxation is, of course, borrowing.
